info.brief_description: Take command of an ancient god of despair and dole out your punishment as you see fit!
info.description:
In this interactive, you take control of Jun-ko, a spirit of despair. After having been recently re-summoned to the Earthly plane, you have decided to take matters into your own hands and begin to spread despair on your own terms through any means necessary! With unlimited power and time on your hands, how will you choose to mess with the poor mortals unfortunate enough to cross your path?

Rules: Anything goes in this interactive. I will not restrict any fetish. The only rule is that, as the title says, there are no happy endings! Whether that be through death or humiliation is up to you.
